poem:
Title: Studio of Power

In the grand theatre of Commons,
an unexpected play unfolds,
a farce amidst the solemn.
Chaos reigns, convention moulds.

Hoyle defies tradition's call,
amendment gripped in debate's snare
On this parliamentary stage, all
unveil their power - raw and bare.

British Palestine sighs, watches on 
the game of politics in dismal dawn.
